method.name: is_enabled
method.description: Checks if the extension is enabled or not.

method.name: set_space_warp_enabled
method.description: Sets the extension as enabled or disabled. If you only want to disable for a single frame, see [method skip_space_warp_frame]. Note: The Application Space Warp project setting must be enabled in order to enable Application Space Warp.

method.name: skip_space_warp_frame
method.description: Skips space warp frame extrapolation for the next rendered frame. This is useful in situations where the player camera is snapping/teleporting to a different position. If you want to disable for longer than a single frame, see [method set_space_warp_enabled].
